# API Reference for cdktf.EtcdBackendProps

   EtcdBackendProps <a name="EtcdBackendProps" id="cdktf.EtcdBackendProps"></a>
  
  Stores the state in etcd 2.x at a given path.
  
  This backend does not support state locking.
  
  Read more about this backend in the Terraform docs:
  https://www.terraform.io/language/settings/backends/etcd
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.EtcdBackendProps.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```typescript
  import { EtcdBackendProps } from 'cdktf'
  
  const etcdBackendProps: EtcdBackendProps = { ... }
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.EtcdBackendProps.property.endpoints">endpoints</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Required) A space-separated list of the etcd endpoints. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.EtcdBackendProps.property.path">path</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Required) The path where to store the state. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.EtcdBackendProps.property.password">password</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Optional) The password. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.EtcdBackendProps.property.username">username</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Optional) The username. |
  
  ---
